titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform for the 119th Congress.
